description:
Penny & Uri and Byonko & Alvin save Zatch and the others from a tight spot! At First they participated in the battle as Zofis’ underlings, but they see the error in their ways.. They rebel against Zofis in the same way as Laila did and appear once again b
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Selfish Penny, Suou Giakuru of Parting Regrets!
Wagamama Patty: Sekibetsu no Suou Giakuru!!
わがままパティ 惜別のスオウ・ギアクル!!
